Package ohos.utils.system

Class SystemCapability.ResourceSchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.utils.system.SystemCapability.ResourceSchedule
  • Enclosing class:
    SystemCapability

    public static class SystemCapability.ResourceSchedule
extends Object
    Defines system capabilities of resource scheduling.
    Since:
    5

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String BACKGROUND_TASK_MANAGER
      Indicates the background task manager, which provides capabilities for applications to manage background tasks.
      static String BUNDLE_ACTIVE
      Indicates the bundle active capabilities, such as querying the bundle usage information and state.
      static String STORAGE_INFO
      Indicates the storage information capabilities, such as querying storage information of an application.
      static String WORK_SCHEDULER
      Indicates the work scheduler, which provides capabilities for scheduling tasks that do not need to be processed immediately.
